(as of Nov 30,2022 12:11:39 UTC – Details)

Product Description

How to install the Lighted Gift Boxes

1. Insert the mounting rod into the folded gift box to support them to a cube.

2. Put them anywhere you like. If used outdoor, use the stakes to fix them to the ground.

3. Plug in and the lights will turn on.

Warning

1. Please cover the plug with a box if used outside.

2. Please unplug this item when not in use.

3. Children must use under the guidance of adults and be kept away from heat sources to avoid accidents.

Specifications Shell Material: Scallion cloth and iron frame IP Rating: IP44 waterproof Boxes Spacing: 10 in Lead Length: 118 in Bulb QTY: 60 count Input:120V~60Hz,0.12A Output: 4.5V,1A Power: AC/DC

Attractive Design – The lighted gift boxes are designed with Christmas elements like snowflakes pattern, pine cones, pine needles, red berries and classic Christmas colors, red, green and blue. The bows are detachable, you can attach them to different boxes as you like
3 Sizes Light Up Christmas Presents – 10″x10″x10″ large red box with 25 led bulbs, 8″x8″x8″ medium green box with 20 led bulbs, 6″x6″x6″ small blue box with 15 led bulbs. The lights are warm white, creating a cozy Christmas atmosphere
Easy to Install and Disassemble – Just insert support rods into the boxes, and put them anywhere indoors. Use the stakes to fix them to the ground if used outdoor. The pop up Christmas gift boxes decorations are retractable for easy storage
Durable Material – Sturdy metal frame supports the Christmas light up decorations. The Scallion cloth covered on the outside is waterproof and not easy to fade. The bulbs are buckled for a beautiful light effect, match your Christmas tree decorations well
Indoor and Outdoor Use – Christmas lighted gift boxes are IP44 waterproof, are perfect outdoor lighted holiday displays for your walkway, yard, porch, or indoor Christmas decorations for locations like living room. Please cover the plug with a box if used outside

How to install the Lighted Gift Boxes

1. Insert the mounting rod into the folded gift box to support them to a cube.

2. Put them anywhere you like. If used outdoor, use the stakes to fix them to the ground.

3. Plug in and the lights will turn on.

Warning

1. Please cover the plug with a box if used outside.

2. Please unplug this item when not in use.

3. Children must use under the guidance of adults and be kept away from heat sources to avoid accidents.

Specifications

  • Shell Material: Scallion cloth and iron frame
  • IP Rating: IP44 waterproof
  • Boxes Spacing: 10 in
  • Lead Length: 118 in
  • Bulb QTY: 60 count
  • Input:120V~60Hz,0.12A
  • Output: 4.5V,1A
  • Power: AC/DC

TOSY 36 and 360 LEDs Frisbee – Extremely Bright Flying Disc, Smart Modes, Glow in The Dark, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, 175g, Perfect Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teenagers
36 SUPER BRIGHT LEDs – 100x brighter than any other light-up discs! Our black plastic disc looks super cool, while the white plastic disc gives you more visibility at night when you throw it outdoor.
SMART MODES & MOTION SENSORS – Easily select the Brightness level and Timer mode you want. LEDs light turns on and off automatically for battery-saving.
RECHARGEABLE – 30-minute charge that lasts up to a thousand throws or a full Ultimate match of 90 minutes. Package includes 1x USB Type C to C cable (charger not included).
175 GRAMS – Our disc meets the Professional Ultimate Frisbee standards for long, straight, precise flights and highly comfortable grip. It is great for freestyle tricks too!
UPGRADE YOUR GAME – Spice up your Christmas shopping list and favorite Frisbee bottle and tossing games (Beersbee, Polish Horseshoes or others) with our highly durable, waterproof and premium discs!

Price: $10.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:33:58 UTC – Details)


Get the fast-paced Reinhard Staupe’s BLINK card game in an exclusive tin. Blink is a fast-moving one-on-one card game that involves counting, shapes and colors. This tin makes a great addition to any game cupboard and helps to keep all your cards neat and organized! ready Ages 7 years and up. Colors and decorations may vary.
This exclusive tin comes with Reinhard Staupe’s fast-moving BLINK Card Game.
BLINK Card Game is a perfect choice for kid, teen or adult game night. Blink is a challenging game for 2 opponents with intense one-on-one play.
The Blink game features lightning-fast action by two players racing head-to-head to be the first to play all of their cards by matching the shape, count or color on the cards.
This sturdy tin makes card storage easy and makes a great gift for 7 year olds and up. Includes one card deck and instructions in a collectable storage tin.

Read more

Read more

Deal Out Fun on Game Night!

For 70 years, Mattel Games has been bringing family and friends together to play. Whatever your preference — matching, counting, speed or strategy — fun is always at hand with a Mattel Card Game.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

Life Sutra aims to reach our diverse consumers, who may not have the time to access practical ways to implement growth-promoting psychoeducational resources, through our thoughtful and fun relationship-enhancing and educational games and tools.

Life Sutra Card Games

How did we get our start?

We launched Life Sutra to equip individuals, couples & families with practical psychoeducational games to empower their relationships and lives.

What makes our products unique?

Our easy-to-play card or board games distill what matters most in our relationships and lives from my extensive training in psychology. Every game play enriches you and your loved ones with life skills for success and happiness.

Why do we love what we do?

I love accelerating growth creatively. It naturally brings me great joy to do this through our games for our Life Sutra consumers too!

Dr. Tania Sharma, Ph.D., CRC

CEO – Life Sutra

Mission: To provide practical psychoeducation to individuals, couples and families to live better, engaged, meaningful, fun and connected lives.

Vision: To develop games and tools to enhance individual, couple and family relationships and Life skills.

Values: Access to practical psychoeducation for all; fostering receptive and connected relationships

Life Sutra Games

Best Gift for any Occasion

BEST CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR NEWLYWEDS – a fun way of entering married life, creating romantic and joyous memories through deep conversations and thoughtful activities
GET DEEP AND AFFECTIONATE – helps you discover new things about your partner through conversations on different topics across different life areas.
BACKED BY SCIENCE – Designed based on scientific and psychological techniques used in marriage counseling, with CBT, EMDR, and mindfulness
PREMIUM ANNIVERSARY GIFT – best quality, and elegant looking gift for your partner, with the use of FSC certified paper for sustainability in packaging. Our cards are printed with love and promote environment friendly products
BUSINESS WITH A HEART – Combine GREAT FUN along with heartwarming activities. Part of our profits from each game purchased is donated to Feeding America
FOR ANY OCCASION – couples toys – husband gift – marriage card game – married games – connect card – couple love – conversation cards couples – couple conversation starters – spouse games – couple question game – anniversary gift husband – best couples game – conversation cards – couples question cards – communication game – couples things – partner games – newlywed games – couple card games – couple activities – newlywed game – romantic couple


Read more





Talk, Connect & Share

Couple Connect game will help you generate thought provoking conversations that will strengthen and deepen your relationship.

Do, Act & Experiment

This card will also help you try behavioral techniques that will increase mindfulness, awareness and acceptance in your relationship

Game that Creates Special Moments

Deepen your bond holistically across 13 important life areas. It's a great tool for learning about each other, staying on the same page, and sharing ideas and feelings.

Read more


Couple Connect is a card game for couples with easy-to-follow instructions. The strategic game helps to deepen your connection, talk about things that are difficult to talk about, and reconnect in the best way possible.

Build trust, intimacy and reignite your romance. Couple Connect is a great tool for improving communication in your relationship.


A New Way to Connect

Write a new story about how you two communicate today

Build a deeper, emotional bond with your partner by asking meaningful questions & doing fun activities great for your relationship.


Spice it up - Rekindle the Romantic Spark

Try a variety of novel psychological techniques and feel your romantic moments more intensely.

Learn to re-program your mind and body to classify positive romantic moments as "sparks."


Feel Loved & Cherished

Couple Connect will help you discover how you both feel loved, cared for, and nurtured by each other.

When you play our game, you create a dedicated space in your day to deepen your bond, pay positive attention, and make each other feel special.


Enjoy Deeper Access to Your Partner

Every card you play gives you a doorway into your partner's thoughts and feelings.

Couple Connect can help you communicate with your partner in novel ways that you may not have tried before.


WHY


EVERYONE


LOVES


THIS GAME


Couple Connect Couple Reconnect Dating Connect Social Genius Bulls & Bears Board Game
Discover Life Sutra Games For couples who have been together less than 10 years and want to strengthen their bond For Couples who have been together for 10+ years and want to rekindle Romantic Spark Game for singles who want to master the Art of Dating Family Game to master Social Skills and boost confidence Family Game to Master Personal Finance & Investments

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Price: $6.49
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:24:52 UTC – Details)


The UNO matching card game everyone loves goes to a galaxy far, far away with this special Star Wars edition. Featuring both classic and newer characters spanning the movies of the beloved Skywalker Saga, it also includes “The Force” wild card unique to this deck. Players aim to get rid of all their cards by matching a card in their hand with the current card shown on top of the discard pile. When players are down to one card, they must prove that the Force is with them by shouting “UNO!” This edition of the family-favorite card game makes a great gift for players 7 years and older, especially Star Wars fans. Colors and decorations may vary.
It’s the classic UNO card game everyone loves, now pitting the forces of the Light Side and the Dark Side against each other! Perfect for Younglings and Master Jedi alike, ages 7 years and older.
Each card is decorated with an iconic image from the Star Wars franchise, including classic characters from the original trilogy, the prequels and the sequels -a great collector’s edition!
Just like in the classic UNO game, players match cards by color or number in a race to empty their hand.
Includes an exclusive wild “The Force” card. Play it, choosing another player and a color. If that player has at least one card of that color, they are forced to draw 2 cards. If they don’t, play just continues with the chosen color.
UNO Star Wars makes a great gift for Star Wars fans of all ages.

Ker Plunk! is a blast from the past with a cool look and attitude! The object of the game is to skillfully remove the sticks from the tube while dropping the fewest marbles possible. The translucent tube stands upright on a base that contains four separate numbered trays. Each player selects a numbered compartment to use throughout the game, and the straws are passed through holes midway of the tube to form a lattice “web.” The marbles are then placed in the top of the tube and held in place by the web. Just set it up, start playing and watch out for marbles that go “Ker Plunk!” The players must use steady hands and a cool head to remove the sticks from below the marbles. This best game from yester-year is just as much fun today! Share your great memories or start new ones! You and your friends will have a blast playing Ker Plunk!, just don’t let the marbles fall! For 2 to 4 players.
Ker Plunk! is a blast from the past with a cool look and attitude!
Create a “lattice” of sticks midway through the translucent tube and place the marbles on top; players choose one of four compartments in the base -2 to 4 people can play!
Players take turns removing sticks while trying to prevent the marbles from dropping through.
The player with the least number of marbles at the end of the game, wins!
A fsvorite game from yester-year that’s just as much fun today!

It’s a blast from the past with a cool look and attitude!

Kerplunk! has been a family favorite for 50 years — and this beloved game is just as much fun today!

Read more

Easy to learn, so much fun to play!

There’s no reading required to play this cool kids’ game, so it’s great for kids and parents, alike!

Read more

Simple setup means more playtime!

Simple setup means more playtime!

Just create a web of sticks midway through the translucent tower, then pour the marbles overtop — it’s so easy!

Keep a steady hand and a cool head!

Players take turns pulling out one stick at a time — be careful not to let the marbles drop!

Don’t let the marbles go ‘Kerplunk’!

The player with the fewest marbles at the end of the game is the winner!

Read more

Fun competition and silly giggles!

This quick, easy game is the perfect party game for kids 5 years old & up — just don’t let the marbles drop!
